name: Comedy Skit Template
description: Template for creating humorous skits with setup, punchline, and callback structure
template: POV: You're {character_description} and {initial_situation}. *{action_1}* '{dialogue_1}' *{reaction_1}* But then {plot_twist}! *{action_2}* '{punchline_dialogue}' *{final_reaction}* {callback_line}. Tag someone who would totally do this!

variables.name: character_description
variables.description: Description of the character or person in the skit

variables.name: initial_situation
variables.description: The initial funny scenario or situation

variables.name: action_1
variables.description: First physical action or behavior (for visual description)

variables.name: dialogue_1
variables.description: First line of dialogue or thought

variables.name: reaction_1
variables.description: Initial reaction or response to the situation

variables.name: plot_twist
variables.description: The unexpected turn that makes it funny

variables.name: action_2
variables.description: Second action or behavior after the twist

variables.name: punchline_dialogue
variables.description: The main funny line or punchline

variables.name: final_reaction
variables.description: Final reaction or expression for comedic effect

variables.name: callback_line
variables.description: A callback to earlier in the skit for extra humor

hooks.text: Tag someone who would totally do this!
